UserProfile.title: UserProfile
UserProfile.description: Represents a user profile within the GreenTrader Analytics application.

id.description: Unique identifier for the user profile.

registrationDate.description: The date and time when the user registered.

Transaction.title: Transaction
Transaction.description: Represents a single transaction in the user's history.

type.description: The type of transaction (e.g., Buy, Sell, Dividend).

quantity.description: The number of shares involved in the transaction.

price.description: The price per share at the time of the transaction.

date.description: The date and time of the transaction.

total.description: The total value of the transaction.

definition.description: Stores user profile information. The `userProfileId` is the Firebase Auth UID.

params.name: userProfileId
params.description: The unique identifier for the user profile, which matches the Firebase Auth UID.

definition.description: Stores transaction history for a single user.

params.name: transactionId
params.description: The unique identifier for the transaction.

firestore.reasoning: The Firestore data structure is designed to support the GreenTrader Analytics application, with user profiles and their corresponding transaction histories stored in a structured manner. Each user has a `UserProfile` document, and their transactions are stored in a `transactions` subcollection within their user document. This ensures data isolation and scalability.
